chapter.title: &rhla; Compute Node Installation Overview
chapter.para: &kw-hos-phrase; supports &rhla; compute nodes, specifically &rhla; 7.5. &vendor; does not ship a &rh; ISO with &kw-hos; so you will need to provide a copy of the standard &rhla; 7.5 ISO, which can be downloaded from the &rh; website.
There are two approaches for deploying &rhla; compute nodes in &kw-hos;:

listitem.para: Using the &lcm; to automatically deploy &rhla; compute nodes.
Provisioning &rhla; nodes yourself, either manually or using a third-party tool, and then provide the relevant information to the &lcm;.

chapter.para: These two approaches can be used whether you are installing a cloud for the first time or adding a compute node to an existing cloud.
